actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1085.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 9400 to authorize actions for redress in cases involving deprivations of rights of institutionalized persons secured or protected by the Constitution or laws of the United States.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 9400 (Rights of institutionalized persons).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 9400 to authorize actions for redress in cases involving deprivations of rights of institutionalized persons secured or protected by the Constitution or laws of the United States.
